AdjCausDisc is a package uses inputed data and a specific Adjacency matrix that provides the structure of a Directed Acyclic graph to provide a variety of results. The Adjacency matrix will be a matrix of entries of 1s and 0s that describes 
$$
\begin{bmatrix} 
	a & b & c \\
	c & d & d\\
	e & f & g \\
	\end{bmatrix}
$$
